template&lt; bool OtherConst &gt;
    requires std::sized_sentinel_for&lt;
                 ranges::sentinel_t&lt;Base&gt;,
                 ranges::iterator_t&lt;/*或许为 const*/&lt;OtherConst, V&gt;&gt;&gt;
friend constexpr ranges::range_difference_t&lt;/*或许为 const*/&lt;OtherConst, V&gt;&gt;
    operator-( const /*iterator*/&lt;OtherConst&gt;&amp; x, const /*sentinel*/&amp; y );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|
template&lt; bool OtherConst &gt;
    requires std::sized_sentinel_for&lt;
                 ranges::sentinel_t&lt;Base&gt;,
                 ranges::iterator_t&lt;/*或许为 const*/&lt;OtherConst, V&gt;&gt;&gt;
friend constexpr ranges::range_difference_t&lt;/*或许为 const*/&lt;OtherConst, V&gt;&gt;
    operator-( const /*sentinel*/&amp; y, const /*iterator*/&lt;OtherConst&gt;&amp; x );
}}
{{dcl end}}

计算 {{c|x}} 的底层{{lt|cpp/ranges/enumerate_view/iterator|迭代器}}和 {{c|y}} 的底层{{rlp|/|哨位}}之间的距离。

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|enumerate_view::''sentinel''}}|plural=yes|tmpl=yes}}

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|{{lt|cpp/ranges/enumerate_view/iterator|迭代器}}}}
{{par|y|{{rlp|/|哨位}}}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
@1@ {{c|x.base() - y.base()}}
@2@ {{c|y.base() - x.base()}}
